snippet.title: Dreamcast Longplay [021] Buzz Lightyear of Star Command (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Spazbo4

A weird game where each level you have to race the villain to their hideout before they do so you can fight and arrest them

Early on the game forces you to do the time trails and collecting robot parts to get more medals to play the later levels but I don't do it for every level because it was really annoying
